title: Eye Witness. No. 56
creator_credit: Ronald Weyman, Felix Lazarus, Hector Lemieux, David Bairstow and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Cinemagazine items as follows: Scottish Shepherd Tries New Pastures: A boost to Newfoundland’s wool and mutton trade is given by Robert Evans, Scottish shepherd and breeder who uses the province’s many acres of grazing land on the Avalon peninsula for a new and profitable industry. Outdoor Classrooms Help Children Catch Up: Children who have fallen behind in their studies find summer school easy to take when lessons are in the pleasant surroundings of Toronto’s High Park. Canadian Experts Help Arab Farmers: Bringing knowledge and skills from where they are known to where they are needed is the job of two Canadian agricultural experts working with the Food and Agriculture Organization in Iraq.
